The Nokia 3110 classic is a "[[Bar (form)|candybar]]" cameraphone which uses the [[Nokia Series 40|Series 40]] operating system and operates on [[GSM]] networks operating at 900MHz, 1800MHz, or 1900MHz, supporting EDGE ([[Enhanced Data Rates for GSM Evolution]]) connections. In some regions the phone was marketed as the Nokia 3110c, which is the same as the 3110 classic.
The Nokia 3110 classic is a "[[Bar (form)|candybar]]" cameraphone which uses the [[Nokia Series 40|Series 40]] operating system and operates on [[GSM]] networks operating at 900MHz, 1800MHz, or 1900MHz, supporting EDGE ([[Enhanced Data Rates for GSM Evolution]]) connections. In some regions the phone was marketed as the Nokia 3110c, which is the same as the 3110 classic.
